name: Jumper X: Addictive Jump Game
description:
Very addictive jump game with unlimited levels absolutely free. Must try to believe it.
Come and meet Jumper X... Take him higher and higher... But dont drop him down...


---------------------------
*** Game Facts ***

Unique game design based on very popular jump game concept With addictive gameplay and unlimited levels, it will never let you down in your boring times.

22 Powers to unlock, 56 collectibles to collect in four themes realistic themes.

Four realistic themes with cool animations makes this game stand apart from rest.

Awesome rain, snow & wind effects adds realism.


---------------------------
*** Game Play ***

- Tilt the screen to control the jumping boy.
- Land in paddles to avoid falling down.
- Avoid getting closer to Spider, snake & Lion.
- Collect and wear matching shirts,pants,caps & shoes for higher level bonus.
- Unlock and use special powers to aid your jumping.
- Try to get to top of online Ranking.

---------------------------
*** Features ***

- Very simple tilt control based game.
- Four realisitic themes inluding snow, forest, desert & MoonLight.
- Awesome Rain, Snow, Wind & Lightening special effects.
- Online global Leaderboards with support for GameCenter.
- OpenFeint Leaderboards for devices using IOS 4.0 and below.
- Option to control all game sounds & background music.
- Unlimited Levels with progressive difficulty.
- Seperate local leaderboard with additional details.
- Level based bonus scores based on your style points.
